shortDescription: Premium 3-seater sectional sofa with chaise lounge, perfect for modern living rooms

description.overview: Experience ultimate comfort with our Modern Comfort Sectional Sofa. This contemporary piece features a spacious design with an attached chaise lounge, perfect for relaxing or entertaining guests. The sofa combines style and functionality with its clean lines, plush cushioning, and durable construction.
keyFeatures: High-density foam cushioning for lasting comfort

materials.frame: Kiln-dried hardwood frame with reinforced joints
materials.cushioning: High-density polyurethane foam wrapped in polyester fiber

reviews.title: Absolutely love this sofa!
reviews.content: The quality is outstanding and it's incredibly comfortable. The fabric feels premium and the color matches perfectly with my living room decor. Assembly was straightforward and the delivery team was professional.

reviews.title: Great value for money
reviews.content: Solid construction and comfortable seating. The only minor issue is that the cushions are a bit firmer than expected, but they're breaking in nicely.

shortDescription: Ergonomic high-back office chair with premium leather upholstery and lumbar support

description.overview: Transform your workspace with our Executive Leather Office Chair. Designed for professionals who spend long hours at their desk, this chair combines ergonomic excellence with luxurious leather upholstery. The advanced lumbar support and adjustable features ensure maximum comfort throughout your workday.

warranty.mechanism: 5-year warranty on gas cylinder and tilt

reviews.title: Best office chair I've owned
reviews.content: After working from home for 2 years, I finally invested in a proper chair. The ergonomic support is fantastic - no more back pain after long work sessions.

shortDescription: Solid oak dining table with live edge design, seats 6-8 people comfortably

description.overview: Bring natural beauty to your dining room with our Rustic Oak Dining Table. Crafted from solid oak with a stunning live edge design, this table showcases the natural grain and character of the wood. Perfect for family gatherings and dinner parties.
keyFeatures: Solid oak construction with live edge

materials.tabletop: Solid oak with live edge, 2-inch thick
materials.finish: Natural oil finish with protective coating

reviews.title: Stunning centerpiece
reviews.content: This dining table is absolutely gorgeous! The live edge wood is beautiful and each piece is unique. It's become the focal point of our dining room.

shortDescription: Minimalist platform bed with built-in nightstands and LED lighting

description.overview: Create a modern bedroom sanctuary with our Contemporary Platform Bed. This sleek design features built-in nightstands and optional LED lighting for a truly contemporary look. The low-profile design and clean lines make it perfect for modern and minimalist bedrooms.

reviews.title: Perfect modern bed
reviews.content: Love the sleek design and the built-in nightstands save so much space. The LED lighting creates a great ambiance. Assembly was straightforward with clear instructions.

shortDescription: Classic Chesterfield armchair with button tufting and rolled arms in premium leather

description.overview: Add timeless elegance to your space with our Vintage Chesterfield Armchair. This classic piece features traditional button tufting, rolled arms, and premium leather upholstery. Handcrafted with attention to detail, it's perfect for studies, living rooms, or reading nooks.

reviews.title: Beautiful classic chair
reviews.content: The craftsmanship is excellent and the leather quality is top-notch. It's become my favorite reading chair. The only minor issue is it took longer to deliver than expected.

shortDescription: Minimalist coffee table with clean lines and hidden storage compartment

description.overview: Embrace Scandinavian design with our minimalist coffee table. Featuring clean lines, natural wood grain, and a hidden storage compartment, this piece perfectly balances form and function. The light wood finish brightens any living space.

materials.top: Solid oak with natural oil finish

reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
reviews.content: Love the clean design and the hidden storage is so useful for keeping remotes and magazines. The wood quality is excellent and it fits perfectly in our apartment.

shortDescription: 5-tier industrial bookshelf with metal frame and reclaimed wood shelves

description.overview: Add industrial charm to your space with our Industrial Bookshelf Unit. Combining sturdy metal framework with reclaimed wood shelves, this piece offers both style and functionality. Perfect for displaying books, decor, and personal collections.

materials.shelves: Reclaimed pine wood with protective finish
materials.finish: Matte black frame with natural wood

reviews.title: Great industrial look
reviews.content: Perfect for my home office. The combination of metal and wood looks great and it's very sturdy. Assembly was straightforward with good instructions.

shortDescription: Round velvet ottoman with gold legs and hidden storage compartment

description.overview: Add a touch of luxury to your space with our Velvet Ottoman. Featuring plush velvet upholstery, elegant gold legs, and hidden storage, this versatile piece works as extra seating, a footrest, or accent table.

reviews.title: Beautiful accent piece
reviews.content: The velvet is so soft and the color is gorgeous. Perfect size for our living room and the storage is handy for throw blankets. The gold legs add a nice touch.

shortDescription: Customizable modular wardrobe with sliding doors and interior organizers

description.overview: Organize your bedroom with our Modular Wardrobe System. Featuring customizable interior layouts, soft-close sliding doors, and premium finishes, this wardrobe adapts to your storage needs while maintaining a sleek appearance.

reviews.title: Excellent storage solution
reviews.content: The modular design allowed us to customize it perfectly for our needs. The sliding doors are smooth and the LED lighting is a great feature. Professional installation was worth it.

shortDescription: Height-adjustable study desk with built-in cable management and storage drawers

description.overview: Enhance your productivity with our Ergonomic Study Desk. Featuring height adjustment, built-in cable management, and ample storage, this desk is perfect for students and professionals working from home.

materials.desktop: Laminated engineered wood with scratch-resistant coating

reviews.title: Great for work from home
reviews.content: The height adjustment is smooth and the memory settings are convenient. Cable management keeps everything organized. Assembly took some time but instructions were clear.

shortDescription: Handwoven rattan accent chair with comfortable cushions and natural finish

description.overview: Bring natural texture to your space with our Rattan Accent Chair. Handwoven by skilled artisans, this chair features a comfortable cushioned seat and backrest, perfect for creating a relaxed, bohemian atmosphere.

reviews.title: Beautiful natural chair
reviews.content: Love the bohemian vibe this chair adds to my bedroom. The rattan work is beautiful and it's surprisingly comfortable. The cushions are soft and the covers are easy to remove for washing.

shortDescription: Modern console table with tempered glass top and chrome legs

description.overview: Add modern elegance to your entryway or living room with our Glass Top Console Table. Featuring a tempered glass top and sleek chrome legs, this piece creates an airy, sophisticated look while providing practical surface space.

reviews.title: Elegant and modern
reviews.content: Perfect for our modern apartment. The glass top is thick and feels very safe. The chrome legs are well-finished and the overall design is very sleek. Easy to assemble too.

shortDescription: Upholstered storage bench perfect for entryways and bedrooms

description.overview: Maximize your storage with our Fabric Storage Bench. Perfect for entryways, bedrooms, or living rooms, this versatile piece provides comfortable seating while hiding away shoes, blankets, and other essentials.

materials.upholstery: Polyester blend fabric with stain resistance

reviews.title: Great for small spaces
reviews.content: Perfect for our apartment entryway. Stores shoes and bags nicely and provides a place to sit while putting on shoes. The fabric is good quality and easy to clean.

shortDescription: Set of 2 wooden bar stools with footrest and swivel mechanism

description.overview: Complete your kitchen island or bar area with our Wooden Bar Stool Set. These stools feature a comfortable swivel mechanism, built-in footrest, and durable wooden construction that complements both modern and traditional decor.

materials.seat: Solid rubber wood with protective finish

reviews.title: Good value bar stools
reviews.content: Nice quality for the price. The swivel works smoothly and they're comfortable to sit on. Assembly was straightforward. Perfect height for our kitchen island.

shortDescription: Set of 4 upholstered dining chairs with wooden legs and comfortable padding

description.overview: Enhance your dining experience with our Upholstered Dining Chairs. This set of 4 chairs combines comfort and style with plush padding, quality upholstery, and solid wooden legs that complement any dining table.

materials.upholstery: Polyester blend fabric with stain protection
materials.legs: Solid oak wood with natural finish

reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
reviews.content: These chairs are perfect for our dining room. Very comfortable for long dinners and the fabric is easy to clean. The wooden legs match our table perfectly. Great value for a set of 4.

shortDescription: Space-saving corner TV unit with cable management and storage compartments

description.overview: Maximize your living room space with our Corner TV Unit. Designed to fit perfectly in corners, this unit features multiple storage compartments, built-in cable management, and supports TVs up to 65 inches.

reviews.title: Perfect corner solution
reviews.content: Great use of corner space in our small apartment. Fits our 55-inch TV perfectly and has plenty of storage for our media devices. Cable management works well to keep everything tidy.

shortDescription: Premium leather recliner with massage function and USB charging ports

description.overview: Experience ultimate relaxation with our Leather Recliner Chair. Featuring premium leather upholstery, built-in massage function, and convenient USB charging ports, this chair is perfect for your home theater or living room.

reviews.title: Ultimate comfort chair
reviews.content: This recliner is amazing! The leather is top quality and the massage function is so relaxing after a long day. The USB ports are convenient for charging devices. Worth every rupee.

shortDescription: Set of 3 floating wall shelves with hidden brackets and modern design

description.overview: Add stylish storage to any room with our Floating Wall Shelves. This set of 3 shelves features hidden mounting brackets for a clean, modern look. Perfect for displaying books, decor, or everyday essentials.

reviews.title: Great floating shelves
reviews.content: Love the clean look these shelves give to our living room. Installation was straightforward and they hold a good amount of weight. The hidden brackets work perfectly.

shortDescription: Upholstered tufted headboard with diamond pattern and wall mounting system

description.overview: Transform your bedroom with our Tufted Headboard. Featuring elegant diamond tufting, premium upholstery, and a secure wall mounting system, this headboard adds luxury and comfort to any bed frame.

materials.upholstery: Polyester blend fabric with stain resistance

reviews.title: Beautiful headboard
reviews.content: The tufted design looks so elegant in our bedroom. The fabric is good quality and the mounting system is very secure. Installation was easier than expected with clear instructions.

shortDescription: Set of 3 nesting coffee tables with marble tops and gold metal legs

description.overview: Add versatility to your living room with our Nesting Coffee Tables. This set of 3 tables features beautiful marble tops and elegant gold metal legs. Perfect for entertaining or everyday use, they nest together to save space when not needed.

materials.feet: Adjustable leveling feet with floor protection

reviews.title: Elegant nesting tables
reviews.content: These tables are beautiful and very functional. The marble tops are gorgeous and the gold legs add a luxurious touch. Perfect for our modern living room. Assembly was straightforward.
